website_summaries.verdict: A stunning high-shine gloss that pairs well with a variety of colors while visibly plumping lips.
pros: Tingling sensation is subtle and quick
Gloss moisturizes lips leaving them both soft and visibly plumper
The clear gloss pairs well with any shade of lipstick
High-shine lasts for hours without feeling sticky or thick
cons: Plumping effect only lasts roughly 20 minutes

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It really works. But the first 10 minutes it itched a little bit
customer_reviews.author: Teanny

customer_reviews.title: Not at all as effective as a tube I bought last year
customer_reviews.text: I have a tube of Too Faced Lip Injection Extreme gloss I purchased a year or so ago at a local beauty supply store and it worked great. Just purchased the same exact item here on Amazon and it is not at all as effective as the other tube I have. I'm not sure if they changed the formula or if they just developed a less effective produce to sell cheaper on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Stinging Irritation - but does plump and color!
customer_reviews.text: This definitely plumps your lips. The problem is that it seems it's more an irritation that's causing the plumping and it really stings. I haven't figured out how to apply it without the skin around my lips getting irritated as well. I've tried a thinner application just in the middle of the lips - but it still causes the skin around my lips to look red and irritated. Not really the look I was going for. After it's worn off a bit, my lips do have more color.
customer_reviews.author: Tigger82

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Makes lips brighter red. Plumps up crack and folds. Doesn't really make them bigger looking and if you go over onto the skin it looks very funny. Kind of inflamed.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the gloss itself, and as only a gloss did it work well. I did not notice that it plumped my lips, but I have not come across any lip plumpers that actually do. Three stars because the gloss is pretty. I won't spend that much on just plain gloss again, but it will be fun while it lasts. It did not feel like anything on my lips, no tingles or burning sensation.
customer_reviews.author: CJ Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Not Worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: There is a slight moisturizing element, very little burning sensation but very little plumping.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Hunter

customer_reviews.title: I wish you got more for your money. The ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish you got more for your money. The tube is small. Doesn't last as long as I'd hope. You can definitely feel it, but it doesn't bother me. Need to be careful, can't kiss when you where it or it may irritate other's lips.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Parr

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I think I was expecting more. You can see in the attached picture, there's nominal difference in plumping. Upon first applying, I noticed this stung more than I imagined it would - think of applying isopropyl alcohol to cracked, chapped lips (but my lips aren't chapped). There's also a tingling, crawling feeling as well. The burning lasted a good 10 minutes before it subsided. And aside from red, uncomfortable lips, there is onlu the tiniest in plumping for me. Definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CamaroBabe

customer_reviews.title: Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of a video I saw on YouTube and wanted to try it out. My lips are actually already big but I was definitely able to tell the difference in my top lip after I applied it. The stinging is very tolerable and only lasts for maybe 3-5 minutes. I’d buy again!
customer_reviews.author: lauryn

customer_reviews.title: Causes mouth blisters, DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: PLEASE DON’T BUY THIS PRODUCT. It gave me legit blister-like sores all over the inside of my mouth. I am not allergy prone, don’t have sensitive skin, & have never had a negative reaction to a product in my life, so whatever is in this stuff, it can’t be safe. Did it work? Sure. But I couldn’t eat or drink anything without wincing for 4 days after using it.
customer_reviews.author: BJaber

customer_reviews.title: Better off using a jalapeno on your lips. Doesnt work.
customer_reviews.text: I watched YouTube videos and looked at reviews on this product and found mostly good reviews, going off that I purchased it in hopes I wouldn't be wasting my money. I was very wrong, not only did this product fail to "plump" my lips and make them bigger, or at least appear that way, the small tube it comes in had all the product stuck to the applicator so when I pulled it out most of it came out with it onto my table. I would be better off rubbing a jalapeno on my lips for a couple cents at Walmart. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Magen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So everyone needs to understand, if you have sensitive skin like me, your lips will turn a little pinkish redish, i personally love it because it makes it look like i have a light lip tint on. I love how plump my lips get using this product. It is also soo shiny! 😘
customer_reviews.author: Jaycie

customer_reviews.title: Look at size before buy too much for this size
customer_reviews.text: I did not pay attention this was the travel size my bad - can buy the regular size for close to this price at multiple places around me.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't work..I'm really starting to think all the product reviews on Amazon are false.. I felt the burn waiting 1O mins and nothing..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not overly impressed
customer_reviews.text: Slight, very slight noticible change in size of lips not worth the cost of the product because it does not last long enough thru getting ready and date night. Read all the reviews and never experienced the burning everyone was talking about. Maybe....maybe, a slight tingle.
customer_reviews.author: SCBlizzard

customer_reviews.title: i love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: nothing makes my lips feel better than when i wear this. it's the only gloss i will ever wear. it does plump (burn) for a while. (i've compared this extreme version to the regular lip injection and this extreme version is smoother and goes on easier than the regular stuff)
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good plumper
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap but the product anywhere isn’t cheap. Also doesn’t taste that good, but it does the job when it comes to plumping and doesn’t make my lips feel completely numb or super burning like most other plumbers; Definitely less uncomfortable than other
customer_reviews.author: Word

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good product. I did my research before ordering and it is living up to the reviews. It doesn't really burn it's more like a pins and needles tingle. It smells great and last for a good amount of time. The difference between the two of the pictures is just a minute or two. But I do use the doe foot applicator to massage the gloss into my lips. I feel like that gives the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki H.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this product because all the consumer sites rated it so highly, but when I tried it, it did nothing. I didn't even get that tingling sensation. It works as a nice clear gloss but did absolutely zero plumping. Really disappointed. Does anyone have recommendations for products that do work?
customer_reviews.author: erinsoul

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I won’t go out without this! :) As far as lip plumpers go, this is one of the better ones and I’ve tried a few! It’s certainly not as drastic as a filler but it does make a visible difference. I apply this first, then chapstick, then lipstick, and it keeps my lips moist and plump for hours.
customer_reviews.author: WILLOW L

customer_reviews.title: Love this plumper!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely moisturizes the lips as well as plumps!! It burns a bit so be careful when using! Also when you have it on be careful not to let your hair rub it and let it hit your face because your cheeks will turn red if you get it on them
customer_reviews.author: Jaelyn Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Nice and plump
customer_reviews.text: I really like this! It burns some and makes your lips red but they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Will pettigrew

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: thought I would give it a shot, but I knew better to order something like this off of amazon. Nothing compared to the ones bought at Ulta or Sephora. I can use the ones there and it works amazing, the one from amazon didn’t do a dang thing.
customer_reviews.author: aly dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Not all its hyped up to be!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what everyone else got but this product did absolutely nothing it said it was supposed to do. All it did was put a gloss on my lips. No plumbing happened and I applied it as directed. I even tried it for a few weeks before writing this review. Do not waste your money. It definitely not worth your cash.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Nice moisturizer and that's about it. I've been looking for so long for a lip plumper. Finally thought I hit the jackpot and was just disappointed. Felt the tingly feeling and everything, then saw absolutely no difference. That one star is for the moisturizing factor, though I wasn't looking for a chapstick.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: It’s Okay
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not bad. I don’t know if I’ve seen much of an actual plump coming from this product but I do like the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Love This Plumper!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried lots of different lip plumpers and this one is the best I have used, so far. I can visibly see a difference in minutes! I like to put on my lipstick and then put this particular plumper on top, and it helps prevent “feathering” of my lipstick, immensely. If you have sensitive skin, this might not be the plumper for you, though. You can feel it kind of burn a bit, while it is activating. It doesn’t last long, but you should be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee Estelle Bingham

customer_reviews.title: No difference than other cinnamon infused...
customer_reviews.text: This does the same as any other lip plumper w cinnamon added. It is a recognized sting and mild flavor one gets w a similar lip plumper. Small tube is also disappointing. Would I buy again? No...
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Ohhhh yesss
customer_reviews.text: This product works for me.. 2 layers and my lips were tingling!! I love the sweet scent also.Will purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Li'Aven

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Did not plump my lips at all just made them beet red and glossy. Also way too expensive for it to do nothing for the price. Bottle was maybe the size of my pinky.
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Burns
customer_reviews.text: It seems to plump well but it BURNS and beware ... it turned all around my lips BEAT RED for about 20 minutes
customer_reviews.author: rl o.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Definitely works and I’ve recommended to all my friends. I love this product
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Williams

customer_reviews.title: Feels like it works but.......
customer_reviews.text: The tingling can be a little irritating. Don’t really see plumping
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA WOOD

customer_reviews.title: Is this a joke?
customer_reviews.text: I was sent the travel size when the full size is the same price. How disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Nadia hirtzer

customer_reviews.title: This was a good product it works but it doesn't last past two ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a good product it works but it doesn't last past two weeks , for the amount of money that you pay it for , I'm very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Kiikii

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, but, it is so thick it is hard to get on the applicator, at times, the Too Faced Lip Injection I bought off the shelf was a lot better, my local store was out of stock. Next time I will just wait for their shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Looooove this gloss. Makes my lips tingle and look full and lucious!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: The blood rushing to my lips makes the perfect lip color
customer_reviews.text: It does plump your lips for maybe five to ten minutes, but then they go back to normal. What I like about it is the smell. I also like that it makes the blood rush to my lips which creates a natural blushing affect for the perfect lip color. They also feel very moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Omg!
customer_reviews.text: It’s crazy how fast it works! I used multiple coats and it worked so well!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Burns my lips badly
customer_reviews.text: It burns my lips badly and the taste is awful. It does nothing to my lips. It just gives the illusion by making my lips burn.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I always replace mine when it’s gone
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day it keeps my lips nice and soft and fills in my lip lines nicely.
customer_reviews.author: id

customer_reviews.title: good lip plumper but over priced
customer_reviews.text: This lip plumper works just like any other I have used. No complaints about it but I do believe it is over priced for the value it gives
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Caused irritating red spots around my lips after use
customer_reviews.text: This product caused me to break out with red spots all around and under my lips. I’m not sure if this is because maybe I have some sort of allergy to something in the lipgloss or it is just a bad product, but either way i’m very disappointed with this purchase. Absolute waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Delaney B

customer_reviews.title: Got cracked lips no plump...
customer_reviews.text: Try it for three days...no plumping just dry cracked lips
customer_reviews.author: Ana M Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Love This Lip Plumper
customer_reviews.text: Love this Lip Plumper. Makes Lips appear fuller and very moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Legare

customer_reviews.title: Quick plump lips
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product since it first came out, I will say the formula from the first time to now isn’t as strong, but it still works if you’re looking for a quick plump lip look! Nothing too dramatic and it does give a tingly sensation on your lips once applied.
customer_reviews.author: Livs

customer_reviews.title: It Is What It Is
customer_reviews.text: It tingles, but I don’t feel like it really did anything to plump my lips. I feel like this product was overly hyped. And I wouldn’t say it’s worth the money...
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lavaun

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't tingle, it burned. Not in a way that I couldn't manage but not something I'd put on my lips all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: DONT WASTE YOUR MONEY! The only thing this did was moisturize my lips a little bit. Nothing else changed, the color didn’t change and my lips didn’t get fuller. And it also didn’t stay on super long. Super overpriced for an average lip gloss. Wishing I didn’t buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I have really thin lips and this really helps can’t find a better lip plumper than this
customer_reviews.author: Lizbet o.

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: I haven't noticed any change on size. It burns a little and lips get red. I read that on reviews but I wanted to check myself. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Andrade

customer_reviews.title: No plumpness
customer_reviews.text: It did not effect my lips, no plumbing, however the irritation caused extreme redness on my lips and around them. I was hopeful because the irritation my lips would swell a little but they did not they were just extremely.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Extreme lip plump?
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this lip plumper because people have said that it worked really well. This wasn’t the case for me. Not only did it burn the crap out of my lips, my lips only stayed plump for like 2 minutes. Definitely was not worth the amount I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Danyel

customer_reviews.title: Not what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete scam. The product does nothing except work as a lip gloss. It did tingle the first time I used it but after that nothing. It certainly didn't plum up your lips. Save your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Martir

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Can never use another lip gloss again because this one spoiled me. It’s better than any lipstick or lipgloss I’ve ever used. HIGHLY recommend. It stings a little but that’s part of it. I feel so good when I’m wearing it
customer_reviews.author: Natalie McKnight

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: took a while to plump but i am very happy
customer_reviews.author: Allisa Barber

customer_reviews.title: Decent plumping effect.
customer_reviews.text: Def tingles and swells but doesn't seem to last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Collard

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't burn and my lips didn't look as big as they do in some of the videos I'd seen but overall I absolutely love it. It made my lips look luscious!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Auna

customer_reviews.title: It worked the first time, but not so much after that.
customer_reviews.text: The product definitely plumped my lips the first use and burned like hell but after using it the next day it barely tingled and did not do as well as the first day. I was super bummed too considering i've been wanting this product for a long time and it finally dropped to a price i could afford. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Weygant

customer_reviews.title: Fuller lips
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip plumper, it works. I will order more. It does plump. Happy I purchased it. My opinion is that everyone’s body chemistry will react differently with it. I got lucky.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very little change
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have any tingling. I saw very small difference. I'm not sure I'll reorder. But it came fast and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Terri W.

customer_reviews.title: Not a miracle fixit for thinner lips
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent product with somewhat of a plumping effect.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: First red flag was when you unbox the lip serum the product isn’t sealed or wrapped like in store. There was no seal at all. After applying there’s a mentholated feeling but that’s it. No plump. No difference.
customer_reviews.author: HG Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hard to see any difference after using this lip plumper.
customer_reviews.author: Judith S.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for me :(
customer_reviews.text: Does not work for me. No tingling sensation no plumping. It’s just like normal gloss :(
customer_reviews.author: Shantanu J.

customer_reviews.title: Product works great
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing tyed a lot of products and they didn’t work FOUND ONE THAT DOES THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: I love these, it’s easier than going to Ulta...😊
customer_reviews.text: This one works a lot better than others that I bought before
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Bajhart

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Lips barely increase in size and burn in the process. I did like that they kept your lips moistened and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel A Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works the first few times
customer_reviews.text: This project worked awesome for the first few times...after that I haven’t felt the tingly feeling or the lip pumping since then! Sucks- bc I loved It and was hoping for it to work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My lip gloss is poppin
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never tried this before. Heard it was pretty good, I surprised with the smell. Smells fruity and definitely made my lips glossy. Does make my lips appear bigger, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina G.

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely no plumping effects, which is the only reason I bought it, some moisturizing properties, but there are cheaper lip balms or there.
customer_reviews.author: anamaria rotar

customer_reviews.title: To do what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.text: I did not see a difference at all and wear all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Lupita69

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don’t work at all. There’s no tingling or redness. Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: candy taber

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t  do what it was supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like it all it does is burn my lips and make them red didn’t add any volume/plumpness at all
customer_reviews.author: Misty Price

customer_reviews.title: Burning
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product at all. As soon as I finished applying it, I immediately felt a burning sensation and it escalated and remained like this for a few minutes. I'm grateful that I only purchased one.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cardoso

customer_reviews.title: Nice, thick, long lasting results for me.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and lasts longer than I expected. Keeps my lips moist.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fall for the lies
customer_reviews.text: It does not make your lips plumped at all. Not only I tried it but I had my bf, sister and coworker try and and absolutely no results for any of us.
customer_reviews.author: dawn

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't do much
customer_reviews.text: It's not making much difference, but I'll give it a few more tries before I ask for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: VERY UNSANITARY
customer_reviews.text: when my package arrived the box was all beat up and the lip gloss was OPENED. absolutely disgusting especially with a pandemic going on. 100% returning this. yuck.
customer_reviews.author: cmrom

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: It has a nicer gloss to it but no tingling feeling and did not plump my lips
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Did not meet expectations
customer_reviews.text: I used lip injection before and I love it. I was disappointed in the size for the money. I buy it Alta and it’s bigger in size and cost less. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works very well
customer_reviews.text: It worked and smells like strawberries and it stays plump all day and it tingles good stuff. This product and Victoria secret extreme plump works.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: no volume
customer_reviews.text: It does not give much volume and the volume lasts for less than one hour. I expected it remains at least for 3-4 hours based on description on the website.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Burns lips a lot
customer_reviews.text: When I applied it it started burning my lips to the point of having to remove it with water and a baby wipe to remove it and stop the burning.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra B.

customer_reviews.title: It's more like a moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't feel or look extreme I'm just going to try something else next time. Sorry not happy 👎
customer_reviews.author: Gisela Lara

customer_reviews.title: Its a Scam!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The ítem was super small i paid $29 for 0.05 onz and i just check in shepora and the are $29 for 0.14 onz. Dont buy this product si a scam
customer_reviews.author: rocio zumbado zumbado

customer_reviews.title: Always my fave
customer_reviews.text: I found this product in Sephora and haven't looked back since. This one is definitely a squat version but perfect for the makeup bag
customer_reviews.author: Poopiepants

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: All it really did was make my lips tingle, turn red and that’s about it. My lips did not increase in size at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This was a big waste of money. It did NOTHING for my lips. It burned for a few mins and and that is it. I could buy lip gloss at dollar tree...
customer_reviews.author: hailey iszkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! You can feel the tingle and see the difference in your lips (plumper)
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Lush Lips!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously it does not taste great if you eat it (don’t eat it) but someone asked me if I got lip fillers so this stuff works MAGIC.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: travel size not full
customer_reviews.text: This is a travel size being sold as a full size
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well but better if you put lipstick on over it. Also if you’re not careful and get it around your lips it looks like you have a rash!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Price

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this stuff!! I always have three tubes on hand in case I run out. Definitely leaves lips plumper and moisturized
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good lip moisturizer but didn’t plump my lips. Really disappointing 😕
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake product! Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Did not work for me. Have used other, cheaper products for lip plumping that actually work. Waste of money, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Fabi Albanese

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and completely happy. My lips looks plumper, but not too much. So happy with it and will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Frances VaughanPrice

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t do it’s job. Also burned so badly I couldn’t keep it on for more than a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn west

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Maybe i got a bad batch but this barely tinged and just wore like normal gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Love my lips!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! My lips look good and it seems to last a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Plunkett

product_meta.title: Too Faced Lip Injection Extreme Lip Plumper Instantly Sexy Lips .05 oz
product_meta.description: Manufacturer: A Lip Serum providing a lip plumping effect. through scientifically proven and advanced technologies. Too Faced uses a potent quadra-delivery system that combines vitamin E, collagen-friendly MaxiLip, and Dehydrated Marine Sponge to support blood flow, promote a look of fullness, and rehydrate with the body's own moisture for a long-lasting effect. Moisturizing doses of avocado and jojoba oil condition to ensure a smooth pout.
feature_bullets: Lip Serum providing a lip plumping effect.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
